import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { AlertsContext } from "../../context/Alerts"; import { UserContext } from "../../context/User"; import axios from "axios"; const PlayerProfile = ({ theme }) => { const [profile, setProfile] = useState([]); const [errors, setErrors] = useContext(AlertsContext); const [user, setUser] = useContext(UserContext); const handleProfile = () => { setErrors([]); if (!profile) { setErrors(["No file selected. Please select an image file"]); return; } // Check file type (case-insensitive) const allowedTypes = ["image/png", "image/jpeg", "image/jpg"]; if (!allowedTypes.includes(profile.type.toLowerCase())) { setError(["Invalid file type. Only PNG, JPG, and JPEG are allowed"]); return; } // Check file size (less than or equal to 5 MB) const maxSize = 5 * 1024 * 1024; // 5 MB in bytes if (profile.size > maxSize) { setError("File size exceeds 5 MB. Please choose a smaller file."); return; } }; return (
